body.name: Nostalgia Retro Compact Countertop Microwave Oven, 0.7 Cu. Ft. 700-Watts with LED Digital Display & Retro Wide 2-Slice Toaster, Vintage Design With Crumb Tray, Cord Storage & 5 Toasting Levels, Aqua
deliveryMessages: Delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 7 hrs 23 mins
features: Product 1: 700-Watts Cooking Power : At 0.7 cubic foot, this microwave provides the cooking power needed to quickly cook and reheat foods

Product 1: Convenient Cooking Controls : 12 pre-programmed cooking settings, delay timer and express cooking provide options for the optimal heating of popular foods like popcorn, pizza, potatoes, veggies and more
Product 1: Digital Clock : Easy-to-read LED display lights up the digital clock and highlights each cooking setting
Product 1: Even Cooking : Rotating glass carousel helps cook food evenly
Product 2: EXTRA-WIDE TOASTER: The 2 large slots are perfect for toasting bagel halves and thick slices of bread, English muffins, and more.
Product 2: LIGHTED CONTROLS: Lighted control buttons feature bagel, defrost, and cancel options
Product 2: PERFECTLY TOASTED: The 5 browning levels allow you to choose your preferred doneness
Product 2: CORD STORAGE: Cord storage in bottom of unit allows for tidy storage
body.description: Nostalgia Retro Compact Countertop Microwave Oven, 0.7 Cu. Ft. 700-Watts with LED Digital Display, Child Lock, Easy Clean Interior, AquaWith a beautiful and sleek retro design, this microwave is sure to stand out in any kitchen. It features 12-pre programmed cooking settings and a bright LED display, making usability simple. Five power levels and 700-watts of power are perfect for reheating leftovers or cooking food.Nostalgia Retro Wide 2-Slice Toaster, Vintage Design With Crumb Tray, Cord Storage & 5 Toasting Levels, AquaCooking a bagel has never been easier with a powerful 900-watt toaster that's equipped to handle all of your toasting needs. Designed to accommodate a variety of breads, two large toasting slots provide ample room for toasting everything from thick slices of bread to bagel halves. Adjust the doneness by choosing from five browning levels for lightly or darkly toasted bread. Also featured are defrost and cancel options, along with a bagel button that automatically adjusts the toasting time for thicker breads like bagels and English muffins. Each control button illuminates when pressed for easy recognition.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great smaller microwave
reviews.reviewText: I liked the toaster oven and breakfast station so much I also bought the microwave and blender. As a senior and living alone, I got rid of the large appliances and found their perfect replacements.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Color matches well as set
reviews.reviewText: Microwave has a steep learning curve but looks great so had to figure it out. Lacks typical control panel.
